carousel.title: Fast, FREE delivery on over 100 million items
carousel.content: Super-fast delivery, tens of millions of items, and flexible delivery options to fit your life. Plus, Prime members get FREE One-Day Delivery on tens of millions of items.

carousel.title: FREE Same-Day Delivery
carousel.content: Prime members get FREE Same-Day Delivery on over three million items with qualifying orders.

carousel.title: Skip the lines and get it on release day
carousel.content: No more waiting in line! Choose Free Release-Date Delivery at checkout on qualified items, and your package will be delivered on the release day by 7pm.

carousel.title: Watch movies, TV, live events, and more
carousel.content: As a Prime member, you can watch exclusive Amazon Originals and thousands of popular movies and TV shows—all at no extra cost. Watch at home or on the go with practically any device.

carousel.title: Free Games & Loot with Twitch Prime
carousel.content: Gamers can get free games, in-game items, a free Twitch channel subscription every month and more with Twitch Prime.

carousel.title: Millions of songs for every moment
carousel.content: As a Prime member, you can stream over 2 million songs ad free, listen on any Echo device, and take your music anywhere with offline listening.

carousel.title: Original audio programs for life on the go
carousel.content: Audible Channels are free with your Prime membership. Enjoy original audio series and playlists handcrafted for every interest. Just download the Audible app and start listening.

carousel.title: Our healthiest benefit yet
carousel.content: Exclusive savings for Prime members in all US stores, 5% Back for eligible Prime members with the Amazon Prime Rewards Visa Card.

carousel.title: The simplest way to shop. Just ask Alexa.
carousel.content: With Alexa, shopping for essentials and reordering your favorite items from Amazon has never been easier.
carousel.detail_comment: Learn more about Alexa and Prime ▸

carousel.title: Exclusive brands and deals available only to Prime members
carousel.content: As a Prime member enjoy early access to deals, Prime exclusive brands, and savings.

carousel.title: Prime members read free
carousel.content: As a Prime member, you can now read as much as you like from over a thousand top Kindle books, magazines, short works, books with Audible narration, comics, children books and more—all at no additional cost.

carousel.title: Read next months new releases today
carousel.content: Each month, Prime members can download one editors pick for free--before the official publication date. Downloaded titles are yours to keep.
carousel.detail_comment: Learn more about Amazon First Reads ▸

carousel.title: Earn more with Prime Rewards
carousel.content: Eligible Prime members can earn 5% back at Amazon.com using the Amazon Prime Rewards Visa Card or the Amazon Prime Store card. All Prime members earn 2% rewards with Amazon Prime Reload.

carousel.title: Unlimited, free photo storage
carousel.content: Back up and share your photos with unlimited photo storage. Add your photos to the free app to see them on all your devices.
